overall.first: The Lights-Out domain models a network of interconnected light bubbles that can be toggled by pressing other bubbles.
overall.detailed-first: In this domain, each light bubble can be either on or off, and bubbles are connected through static links. Pressing a bubble does not change its own state but toggles the states of its neighboring bubbles—if a neighbor is on, it turns off, and if it is off, it turns on. The goal is to reach a configuration where all bubbles are either on or off.

on.detailed-first: Indicates that the given light bubble is in the on state, meaning it is illuminated.

off.detailed-first: Indicates that the given light bubble is in the off state, meaning it is dark.

connected.detailed-first: Defines a static relationship between bubbles. When one bubble is pressed, all connected bubbles have their states toggled.

one-neighbor.first: A bubble has exactly one neighbor.
one-neighbor.detailed-first: Indicates that the bubble is connected to exactly one other bubble in the network.

two-neighbors.first: A bubble has exactly two neighbors.
two-neighbors.detailed-first: Indicates that the bubble is connected to exactly two other bubbles in the network.

three-neighbors.first: A bubble has exactly three neighbors.
three-neighbors.detailed-first: Indicates that the bubble is connected to exactly three other bubbles in the network.

press-1-1.first: Press a bubble whose single neighbor is on.
press-1-1.detailed-first: If a bubble has exactly one neighbor and that neighbor is on, pressing this bubble will turn the neighbor off.

press-1-0.first: Press a bubble whose single neighbor is off.
press-1-0.detailed-first: If a bubble has exactly one neighbor and that neighbor is off, pressing this bubble will turn the neighbor on.

press-2-11.first: Press a bubble whose two neighbors are both on.
press-2-11.detailed-first: If a bubble has two neighbors and both are currently on, pressing it will turn both of them off.

press-2-00.first: Press a bubble whose two neighbors are both off.
press-2-00.detailed-first: If a bubble has two neighbors and both are off, pressing it will turn both of them on.

press-2-10.first: Press a bubble whose first neighbor is on and the second is off.
press-2-10.detailed-first: If a bubble has two neighbors and one is on while the other is off, pressing it will toggle both—turning the on neighbor off and the off neighbor on.

press-2-01.first: Press a bubble whose first neighbor is off and the second is on.
press-2-01.detailed-first: If a bubble has two neighbors and one is off while the other is on, pressing it will toggle both—turning the off neighbor on and the on neighbor off.

press-3-111.first: Press a bubble whose three neighbors are all on.
press-3-111.detailed-first: If a bubble has three neighbors and all are on, pressing it will turn all three off.

press-3-110.first: Press a bubble whose first two neighbors are on and the third is off.
press-3-110.detailed-first: Pressing this bubble will turn the first two neighbors off and the third one on.

press-3-101.first: Press a bubble whose first and third neighbors are on and the second is off.
press-3-101.detailed-first: Pressing this bubble will toggle all three—turning the first and third off and the second on.

press-3-100.first: Press a bubble whose first neighbor is on and the others are off.
press-3-100.detailed-first: Pressing this bubble will turn the first neighbor off and the other two on.

press-3-011.first: Press a bubble whose first neighbor is off and the other two are on.
press-3-011.detailed-first: Pressing this bubble will turn the first neighbor on and the other two off.

press-3-010.first: Press a bubble whose first and third neighbors are off and the second is on.
press-3-010.detailed-first: Pressing this bubble will toggle all three—turning the first and third on and the second off.

press-3-001.first: Press a bubble whose first two neighbors are off and the third is on.
press-3-001.detailed-first: Pressing this bubble will turn the first two neighbors on and the third one off.

press-3-000.first: Press a bubble whose three neighbors are all off.
press-3-000.detailed-first: Pressing this bubble will turn all three neighbors on.
